search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Give Lively (give-lively.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I couldn't locate a dedicated pricing page for Give Lively as the platform offers its services for free, as per its official website. For further details, please consult their official site at [https://www.givelively.org/](https://www.givelively.org/).

extracted_content.content:
OUR PLATFORM

We guide nonprofits into the digital age
----------------------------------------

We built and support a **powerful and practical fundraising platform** that is free for nonprofits and intuitively easy to use for donors.

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/675c4a247836bc03622f5dea_Campaign-Page-Hero-OP2.png)

ABOUT US

Reimagining the future of digital fundraising for nonprofits – powerful, practical and free.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/66acf8ec58578725c46d1564_Vector%201.avif)

OUR OFFER

Explore our online fundraising solutions
----------------------------------------

OUR FEATURES

What our members love
---------------------

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c32b92ec40a9_Duotone.svg)

### **Flexible fundraising**

Unlimited use of products that stand alone and fit together: use the tools you need. One-time, recurring and offline donations. Anonymous giving and dedications.

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3261cec40bd_Duotone.svg)

### **Multiple payment methods**

Major cards, bank transfers, digital wallets, PayPal and more. Transparent third-party payment processor fees. Stripe powers donation intake and disbursement.

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c33f6dec40c5_Duotone.svg)

### **Real-time data**

Anytime access to comprehensive, real-time donor data and on-demand data exports.

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c326f5ec40c2_Duotone.svg)

### **Streamlined donor-first design**

Customizable pages and donation amounts. Impact stories, images and videos show donors how they matter. Responsive layout for mobile, tablet and desktop.

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c365a2ec40c8_Duotone.svg)

### **Privacy and security**

Data served using end-to-end encryption and SSL protect pages. Data stored on encrypted databases. Personal/business data is never sold, rented or leased.

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3d766ec40ea_Duotone.svg)

### **Outstanding customer support**

Live chat and email support aided by AI chat bot. Same-business-day turnaround. Comprehensive online ‘Resource Hub' help center.

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3c8a1ec41c9_Default.svg)

OUR FEATURES

Some qualities that make our solutions special
----------------------------------------------

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c32b92ec40a9_Duotone.svg)

### Flexibility

**Unlimited use of each fundraising product;** recurring and offline donations easily accepted; ability to give anonymously or dedicate gifts

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3261cec40bd_Duotone.svg)

### Payments

**Major payment methods accepted**, including digital wallets; transparent payment processor fees; Stripe powers donation intake and disbursement

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c33f6dec40c5_Duotone.svg)

### Data Analytics

**Anytime access to real-time donor data** and on-demand data exports

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c326f5ec40c2_Duotone.svg)

### Design

**Streamlined, donor-first, customizable design**, built by and for donors; responsive layout for mobile, tablet and desktop

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c365a2ec40c8_Duotone.svg)

### Security

**Data served using end-to-end encryption and SSL protected pages**; data stored on encrypted databases

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c34c83ec40c0_Duotone.svg)

### Support

**Live chat and email support with same-business-day turnaround**; comprehensive online ‘Resource Hub’ help center

OUR MEMBERS

Growing with nonprofits
-----------------------

**9,000+**

member nonprofits

**$1 billion**

raised by member  
nonprofits

**8+ million**

donations

**$0**

charged by Give Lively

$100 million saved
------------------

by member nonprofits on fundraising tech expenses since our start in 2015.

[Learn More ![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c32277ec415a_chevron-down.svg)](https://www.givelively.org/updates/weve-helped-nonprofits-save-100-million-in-tech-costs)

![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/67246d3862a5f35d6b0f31e1_100M%20Section%20Art_OP1.png)

TESTIMONIALS

What members are saying  

--------------------------

![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c37606ec3f7e/66727e9d9d118e15eb187432_Green%20Quote.svg)

Five stars are not enough to describe Give Lively. They are the personification of the expression "go the extra mile". Without Give Lively, Famazonia would not be what it is today. We will be forever grateful.

Joabe Cardoso

Secretary General at Famazonia Foundation

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c37606ec3f7e/666c5fa2df9c328057637453_Fanazonia_green_OP1.png)

![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c37606ec3f7e/6672805b614189d5981260d8_Quote%20Pink.svg)

Give Lively allows our donors to contribute to Malala Fund with ease. Their platform is key to ensuring we can work effectively to create a world where every girl can learn.

‍

Lena Alfi

CEO of Malala Fund

![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c37606ec3f7e/66727a5495b5110eb36b4843_663290890b34c1ccfe05774d_Pink_OP2.png)

![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c37606ec3f7e/6672808439632fd7b274b035_Quote%20Orange.svg)

Give Lively has all the tools needed to make our fundraising efforts succeed... and the team is the best.

‍

Give Lively is definitely the best platform out there.

‍

‍

Karina Damiani

Senior Director at The OUT Foundation

![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c37606ec3f7e/667c4efa01a1f0d5762fd57c_Orange_Slide_3_Out.png)

OUR MODEL: WE'RE FREE

**We work for nonprofits, not for profit**
------------------------------------------

We do not charge nonprofits for use of our fundraising platform, products and features — no setup fees, no platform fees, no membership or subscription fees, no annual or monthly fees, no hidden Give Lively fees.

In addition to major operational support from our philanthropic founder-funders, we accept tips from donors wishing to help nonprofits direct dollars to critical work instead of for-profit digital fundraising software.

![Image 36: Illustration of woman with laptop, sitting on Give Lively logomark, considering membership](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/6696d242086088d87f72f244_Finger%20Snap_B.png)

![Image 37: Illustration of woman with laptop, sitting on Give Lively logomark, considering membership](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/672a4d13496b6a03d753c5f0_Our%20values%20set%20us%20apart_A%201.png)

OUR VALUES

**Our values set us apart**
---------------------------

We support values that inspire nonprofits to tackle tough challenges such as gender and racial equality, reproductive health and LGBTQ+ rights, social and environmental justice, education, domestic violence, immigrant services and more.

![Image 38](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/66a2125db4a70e8568ae80af_24-037-Two_People_OP1%201.webp)

OUR MEMBERSHIP PROMISE

Members gain full and free access to all of our digital fundraising products.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 39](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/66a2206c4a4e43ba9f3fe7e2_Group%20321%20(1).webp)![Image 40](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/66a2146c6ec6cda4fb8fac5e_Vector.png)

OUR MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION PROCESS

Step by step
------------

01

Apply for Give Lively membership

![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3a8b8ec4259_arrow-down.svg)

02

Connect Stripe account

![Image 42](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3a8b8ec4259_arrow-down.svg)

03

Give Lively confirms value alignment

![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3a8b8ec4259_arrow-down.svg)

04

Complete Stripe setup

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3a8b8ec4259_arrow-down.svg)

05

Build a campaign & start fundraising

![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60995de2aeb0c3a6f1ec3f77/60995de2aeb0c3a8b8ec4259_arrow-down.svg)

OUR FAQs

We have some answers that will help you
---------------------------------------

Why should 501(c)(3) nonprofits choose Give Lively?

Our fundraising platform stands apart from others for a trio of reasons:

*   Our cost -- we are free for nonprofits
*   Our direct collaboration with nonprofits
*   Our emphasis on progressive values

### Our platform is free for nonprofits

We believe that nonprofits, no matter their size, should not sacrifice their means to satisfy their missions. So we built and support a powerful and practical fundraising platform that’s free for nonprofits and intuitive for donors — no setup fees, no platform fees, no membership or subscription fees, no annual or monthly fees, no hidden Give Lively fees.

We also never sell, rent or lease any data — just one aspect of our comprehensive approach to data privacy and security. Nor do we charge donors to give through our platform.

Learn more about [why we’re free for nonprofits](https://www.givelively.org/free).

### We communicate and collaborate directly with nonprofits

Give Lively’s dedicated team of advocates and technologists is proud to collaborate directly with nonprofits of all sizes as we improve our platform to better serve their needs and desires. To facilitate this, our nonprofit members have access to a shared transparent feedback tool through which they make requests and upvote others’ suggestions, as well as gauge our progress on projects we undertake.

### Our commitment to nonprofits goes beyond fundraising

We support values that inspire nonprofits to tackle tough challenges and complex issues such as gender and racial equality, reproductive health and LGBTQ+ rights, social and environmental justice, education, domestic violence, immigrant services and more.

In keeping with that, we personally review every membership application to ensure each nonprofit member aligns with our values. We also work to terminate all uses of our technology that promote activities not in alignment with our values

Notably, we believe that #BlackLivesMatter and stand in solidarity with Asian Americans.

Learn more about [the values we hold dear](https://www.givelively.org/values).

How and why is Give Lively’s platform free for nonprofits?

We believe that nonprofits, no matter their size, should not sacrifice their means to satisfy their missions. So we built and support a powerful and practical fundraising platform that’s free for nonprofits and intuitive for donors.

We understand and sympathize with your concern about what “free” means today. We've experienced the same “free” service offers with hidden gotchas. And we know that some services claim to be "free" as a way to justify selling your data.

We pledge to be different.

### What free means to us 

We do not charge nonprofits for use of our fundraising platform — no setup fees, no platform fees, no membership or subscription fees, no annual or monthly fees, no hidden Give Lively fees.

We also never sell, rent or lease any data — just one aspect of our comprehensive approach to data privacy and security. Nor do we charge donors to give through our platform.

Learn more about [why we’re free for nonprofits](https://www.givelively.org/free).

### How is free possible?

Our founders are committed philanthropists. In keeping with their goodwill vision of digital fundraising, they cover our operating costs so that we don’t have to charge nonprofits or donors.

They see Give Lively as a technological remedy to the complexity of fundraising, as well as a way to make strategic, efficient and impartial decisions about how to support the nonprofit community. In Give Lively, they identified a mechanism for sustainably leveraging their resources to help meet the development needs of a very broad group of potential beneficiaries.

That mechanism is our superpower. We call it the Give Lively Effect: a proven way of democratizing and leveling the digital fundraising playing field, guiding nonprofits into the digital age, helping them hit their fundraising goals and freeing them to devote more resources to their critical work.

Learn more about [our founders’ rationale, the Give Lively Effect and our impact](https://www.givelively.org/free).

Still got questions? Let us help you

We built and support a powerful and practical fundraising platform that is free for nonprofits and intuitively easy to use for donors. Sign up today for Fundraising Pages, Text-to-Donate, Peer-to-Peer, Event Ticketing, and more!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Give Lively offers its platform completely free for nonprofits, supported by philanthropic funding.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Access to all features and tools without any fees.
